Title: Mark Cuban denies Mavericks are shopping Kristaps Porzingis
Description: Mark Cuban has heard the rumors that the Dallas Mavericks are shopping Kristaps Porzingis, and he doesn't like them one bit. Cuban, who owns the Mavericks, told Brad Townsend of the Dallas Morning News on Tuesday that the team hasn't had any conversations about trading Porzingis.
Author: Yahoo! Sports
